page.title: 02ANSLOW VILLAGE
page.content: The first thing that strikes you when you enter Anslow village is the quietness of the place.There are no busy roads or motorways to disturb the peace.One other thing that is noticeable immediately is the strange assortment of house types.The majority of houses are quite new,very fancy houses such as one called,Â£Annesly Grange'.Some are old semi-detached houses such as,Â£Walton Villa's',(built in 1899).The majority of land around the village is owned by 6 farmers ,5 of the farms are mixed farms but 1 is a fruit farm during the summer months .There are very few facilities in the area but there is a Methodist chapel a church a very popular pub and a well used village hall which was built in 1952 .
